pr_title: [WFCORE-4932] Reading of identity from security domain causes NPE

timeline.bodyText:
@darranl @fjuma After fix for WFCORE-4407 security domain service was not started before attempting to read the identity which resulted in NPE.
This fix removes NPE but it is still not possible to read the identity and resulting message is "Identity with name [myIdentity] not authorized." This is also invalid response as I should be able to read the identity I just added, right?
timeline.author: Skyllarr

replies.bodyText: Just a clarification that the response Identity with name [myIdentity] not authorized. is unrelated to this NPE bug. This NPE bug is happening since wf-core 9.0.0.Beta7 and before that the response was also Identity with name [myIdentity] not authorized.
replies.author: Skyllarr

replies.bodyText: update: when I add default-permission-mapper to the security domain I can read the identity without not authorized error. I have updated the test case in this PR
replies.author: Skyllarr
